excerpt.rendered:
• Smooth breathable nylon taffeta mesh lining throughout helps keep you cool and dry.
  • Attached, adjustable 3-panel hood.
  • Full zip closure with draft flap and snap-button placket.
  • Long sleeves with adjustable, snap-button cuffs.
  • Interior security zip pocket that’ll help keep your valuables safe while you’re out and about.
  • Dual entry hand pockets with zip closure at the sides.
  • Drawcord adjustable hem lets you get the perfect fit and helps keep the elements at bay.
  • 100% polyester.
    Lining: 100% nylon taffeta 210T.
  • Machine wash, tumble dry.
